review.body:
Great book

I loved everything about this book I really need to read the rest of the books from this one such a good page turner
Wonderful story.
I'd give this book 4 and a half stars but it won't let me.

book.title: The Readers of Broken Wheel Recommend

review.body: Full disclosure: Got 150 pages into it and was bored to tears. What am I missing!?

book.title: Grown-Ups Get to Do All the Driving

review.body:
Picture Book #18
This book is from a child's perspective of all of the negative things that grown-ups do. Some of them include taking a bunch of pills, not being able to run, and making kids act polite all the time. The book is a pretty simple read, but the illustrations are what makes the book s...

Formatting problem

Every chapter the first page is missing or cut short off the top. I figured it out by adjusting the size of the font. But I could never get all of the page. And I had to make the font larger to get more of the page. So, while I've just started the book I thinking getting into it...
Great for young kids! Teaches emotions, even though only the word "moo" is used.

book.title: The Ring of Charon (The Hunted Earth, #1)

review.body: Really enjoyed this.

This was a unique book about some of the struggles and worries kids have while going through tough times. I know some of my students have to deal with crappy home lives and things that are out of their control. I think a lot of them could relate to this book. It deals with these issues in a posit...
I give up. This book is so slow and I can't relate to the opera stuff at all.
Some decent writing appeared unexpectedly at points. Still pretty basic tho

read it to baby Elizabeth cute book :D

wow, very honest sex scenes with no holds barred on the wording. Beats the heck out of the bullcrap flowery euphemisms others have.
On the flip side, there are the odd unbelievably weird things worth mentioning.

book.title: Bitter of Tongue (Tales from the Shadowhunter Academy, #7)

review.body: i'm crying goodbye
3.5 - 3.9 stars

book.title: The Lure of the Moonflower (Pink Carnation #12)

review.body: Could hardly finish this. Only one of the series I read. Too many characters. So not interesting.
Note to the author: one does not simply mix the Italian mafia, animal shape-shifting humans, star-crossed lovers and a pubescent dialogue into a book. The result is horrendous.

book.title: The Sutherlands: One Family Saga: 10 Sexy Stories

review.body:
All 10 stories are centered around one family, the Sutherlands, a Texas oil family.

Shadow Ranch by Robin Covington -
This book was a MM book about Eli Sutherland. Eli returned home to claim his ranch when strange things started happening. Murder was happening and Eli was being framed. Shep, the...
I need this now
